name: Chris Nohall
intro_text: Jag är en resultatorienterad utvecklare med fokus på Web3, integritet och skalbar arkitektur. Som nuvarande utvecklingschef på Blockonomics specialiserar jag mig på att bygga robusta system med React, TypeScript och Node.js. Utöver ingenjörskonst är jag produktgrundare och har lanserat flera plattformar från koncept till produktion.
projects_description: En samling verktyg och plattformar jag har byggt.
polarisaudit_desc: En omfattande plattform för webbplatscompliance som granskar integritet (GDPR), säkerhet, tillgänglighet och prestanda.
emptyinbox_desc: En integritetsfokuserad tillfällig e-posttjänst med automatisk radering efter 7 dagar och säker Passkey-baserad autentisering.
rkexplorer_desc: En specialiserad Bitcoin blockutforskare och betalningsspårningsverktyg byggt för Blockonomics ekosystem.
work_blockonomics_lead_desc1: Leda ett distribuerat ingenjörsteam för att underhålla och skala Bitcoins betalningsinfrastruktur.
work_blockonomics_lead_desc2: Ark Explorer-arkitektur och optimering av betalningsspårningssystem för handlare med stora volymer.
work_blockonomics_lead_desc3: Driva teknisk strategi, mentorera utvecklare och säkerställa höga standarder för säkerhet och prestanda.
writing_welcome_message: Welcome to my writing corner! I write about coding, with an easy-going and personal perspective.
job_gpd_desc1: Implemented New Designs and Features: Utilized React and React Native to develop and enhance web and mobile applications, ensuring seamless user experiences.
job_gpd_desc2: Project Leadership: Led projects from initial Figma designs to final implementation, taking full ownership to deliver user-friendly interfaces.
job_gpd_desc3: End-to-end Testing: Integrated end-to-end testing using Cypress, ensuring robust applications.
job_gpd_desc4: Responsive Design: Created responsive web pages that functioned flawlessly across a wide range of devices, enhancing usability and visual appeal.
job_blockonomics_desc1: Enhanced Payment Solutions: Utilized PHP, Python, WordPress, and other CMS platforms to streamline customer access to Blockonomics’ payment solutions.
job_blockonomics_desc2: CMS Integration: Integrated and customized various CMSs to support seamless payment processing and improve user experience.
job_blockonomics_desc3: Technical Expertise: Leveraged strong technical skills to develop and maintain robust, scalable solutions for cryptocurrency transactions.
job_blockonomics_desc4: Customer Focus: Ensured that payment solutions were user-friendly and accessible, enhancing overall customer satisfaction.
job_uae_desc1: Serverless Architecture and Firebase Integration: Developed serverless apps with Netlify, implementing authentication and Google Maps API.
job_uae_desc2: Full-Stack Development: Built web apps with JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Express for seamless user experiences.
toast_already_sent_email: You have already sent an email
toast_message_on_the_way: Your message is on the way
contact_form_message_placeholder: Hi, we need a frontend developer to on our website at Company X. How soon can we hop on a call to discuss this?
contact_intro_1: Want to say "Hey!"? Got something you'd like to ask?
contact_intro_2: New project or opportunity? Want to hire me? Contact me!
contact_intro_3: Use the form. Alternatively, shoot me an email at chris@nohall.dev.
contact_intro_4: Prefer a face to face? Schedule a call.
